card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Goron, Misfortune Demon 56
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Gyan, Yuugu
card.text: ■ When you attach this to a creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Orega Aura

card.name: Ranga, Yuugu
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. For each aura attached to this creature, that creature gets -3000 power until the End Step ■ Orega Aura

card.name: Tei-Yonshiki, Shinigami
card.text: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Hei-Isshiki, Sasui
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 3 (Darkness): If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is darkness civilization, this creature gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Desatspider, Suisin
card.text: ■ Great Sin of Moonless Night ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ Orega Aura

card.name: Honezonbi, Nushin
card.text: ■ Great Sin of Moonless Night ■ When you attach this to a creature, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a darkness aura, draw a card. ■ Orega Aura

card.name: Hei-Nishiki, Daraku
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your graveyard. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Hasil, Misfortune Demon 51
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed during your turn, put it into the battle zone from your graveyard at the start of your opponent's turn.

card.name: Beasbout, Kyosin
card.text: ■ Great Sin of Moonless Night ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". ''(A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)'' ■ Orega Aura

card.name: Duran Beltran
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.
